title: Development of a Conceptual Pedagogical Framework for Higher Education Mathematics Curriculum Design

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level or higher mathematics knowledge and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Requires establishment of smartphone-based learning environments for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design a PBL-based mathematical model by analyzing the interaction between curriculum and instructional methods.
Learners can develop practice-linked projects using a conceptual learning design framework.
Learners can develop at least three formative assessment tools applicable in smartphone environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
